text:
When you’re in space
you float around

you can’t run a race
when your feet don’t touch the ground

But when you’re on a planet
there’s a special force

it holds you down
and it keeps the ship on course

Its gravity
an invisible friend

it makes you part of the planet
and so you can depend on

Gravity
it never goes away

its working all the time
to get you
through the day

When you’re in space
you’re a tiny thing

you’re not connected
no one else can hear you sing

But when you’re on a planet
there’s a special force

it holds you down
and it keeps the ship on course

Its gravity
an invisible friend

it makes you part of the planet
and so you can depend on

Gravity
it never goes away

its working all the time
to get you through the day

When you’re in space
you can sleep standing up

you float around the ship
and you can’t drink from a cup

But when you’re on a planet
there’s a special force

it holds you down
and it keeps the ship on course

Its gravity
an invisible friend

it makes you part of the planet
and so you can depend on

Gravity
it never goes away

its working all the time
to get you through the day
Rpt to fade

Why does an apple drop from a tree
why can’t it float, why can’t it break

free
Why does a wheel roll down a hill
the invisible force our friend that we call

Now we have a gadget
in our ship

its a gravity field
an so we say

hip hip hooray for
our invisible friend

it makes you part of the planet
and so you can depend on

Gravity
it never goes away

its working all the time
to get you through the day
